DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis breast cancer Tissue sample available Samples select base presence absence tumor receptor , ( i.e . ; estrogen , progesterone , HER2 receptor ) group follow 4 category : Estrogen receptor ( ER ) positive/progesterone receptor ( PR ) positive/HER2negative ERpositive/PRpositive/ HER2positive FISH ERnegative/PRnegative/HER2positive ERnegative/PRnegative/HER2negative ( triple negative basaltype cancer ) PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Menopausal status specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
